front.title: IANA registries for LSP ping Code Points

abstract.t: RFC 4379 and RFC 6424 created name spaces for Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping. However, those RFCs did not create the corresponding IANA registries for the Downstream Mapping object Flags (DS Flags), Multipath Type, Pad TLV and Address Types. There is now a need to make further code point allocations from these name spaces. This document updates RFC 4379 and RFC 6424 in that it creates the IANA registries for that purpose.
